Item.Line: This is Montmartre, where musicians gather and perform around the streets. I have just purchased a new piece of music for us to perform later.
*player receives Gymnopedie* *player can now choose Gymnopedie from level selection*
Playing on the streets is a good way to gain some actual performance experience. It is also a good way to broaden our horizons by listening to other performers.
Gymnopedie... the famous piece by Satie?
I bet I can sight-read this piece. Lets start performing NOW!
